attributes.additional_details: I understand people get enjoyment out of fireworks and displays as I do, but seeing the effects the bangs have on livestock and domestic pets, not to mention our wildlife and people that have served our country who are suffering with the after effects of war. Watching them suffer for other peoples 10 minutes of enjoyment seems unethical. I believe banning noisy fireworks and replacing them with silent ones will eliminate the stress caused.
attributes.background: I would like parliament to consider banning noisy fireworks and replacing them with silent fireworks to prevent the stress caused to people and animals.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for the same action:

Ban the sale of all non-silent fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649354
